topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/544d92b763687259b4160000#post_544d92b763687259b4160000
[bq="mariomarc"]!https://33.media.tumblr.com/0ded8d984d5c170527786833e82ce8cc/tumblr_ne1n5uYE121rhavdko9_500.gif![/bq]
I totally agree here, cause I've seen what happens when people realize that amassing large sums of money doesn't actually make you happy does.

To use a analogy my grandma was born rich; never worked in her life and never ever saw anyone die ever.  Well five years ago my great grandma died and my grandma had a massive breakdown of literally screaming, "oh my god!  Death is a real thing!  Death is a real thing!  Death isn't fictional!  It's not a fantasy character!  Oh my god!  That means one day I'm going to die!  Oh my god!" and she had a massive mental breakdown, went around popping all sorts of drugs and medication in her mental breakdown making it worse until she got into a car crash and the two options for her were to go to a mental care home or go to prison.
